data: `minecraft:weapon` sets the weapon item component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.
`minecraft:weapon` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Name: on_hit_block
data.Description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block

data.Name: on_hurt_entity
data.Description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob

data.Name: on_not_hurt_entity
data.Description: Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage
